contentrichtext.text: {{Use British English|date=April 2012}} {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2012}} {{BLP sources|date=May 2011}} {{Infobox musical artist<!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Musicians --> | name = Dan Hawkins | image = Dan Hawkins 2013(2).JPG | caption = | image_size = | background = non_vocal_instrumentalist | birth_name = Daniel Francis Hawkins | alias = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1976|12|12|df=y}} | death_date = | genre = [[Hard rock]], [[glam metal]], [[glam rock]], [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] | instrument = Guitar, vocals, bass, drums, percussion | occupation = Musician, guitarist, producer, songwriter | years_active = 2000–present | label = [[PIAS Recordings|PIAS]], [[Atlantic Records|Atlantic]], [[Must Destroy]] | associated_acts = [[Stone Gods]], [[The Darkness (band)|The Darkness]] | website = {{URL|http://www.theactualdarkness.com}} | current_members = | past_members = | notable_instruments = [[Gibson Les Paul]] }} '''Daniel Francis Hawkins''' (born 12 December 1976) is an English rock guitarist,<ref name="Fischer2006">{{cite book|last=Fischer|first=Peter|title=MASTERS OF ROCK GUITAR 2: THE NEW GENERATION|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=VRDRKvQZBbUC&pg=PA82|accessdate=7 May 2011|date=1 March 2006|publisher=Mel Bay Publications|isbn=978-3-89922-078-0|pages=82–}}</ref> best known as a guitarist and backing singer of the UK band, [[The Darkness (band)|The Darkness]]. The band fronted by his older brother [[Justin Hawkins]], achieved notable mainstream success between 2002 and 2006. He also plays lead guitar for [[Stone Gods]]. ==References== {{reflist|colwidth=30em}} {{The Darkness}} {{Stone Gods}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Hawkins, Dan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 12 December 1976 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hawkins, Dan}} [[Category:1976 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Chertsey]] [[Category:People from Lowestoft]] [[Category:English rock guitarists]] [[Category:Lead guitarists]] [[Category:Rhythm guitarists]] [[Category:The Darkness (band) members]] [[Category:People educated at Kirkley Community High School]]
